# Framework & Tool Icons

Place your framework and tool icons here.

## Required Icons

Based on `data/cv.yaml`, you need:
- `azure.png` - Microsoft Azure logo
- `databricks.png` - Databricks logo
- `pyspark.png` - Apache Spark/PySpark logo
- `deltalake.png` - Delta Lake logo
- `github.png` - GitHub logo
- `tensorflow.png` - TensorFlow logo
- `pytorch.png` - PyTorch logo
- `sklearn.png` - Scikit-learn logo
- `opencv.png` - OpenCV logo
- `qgis.png` - QGIS logo

## Recommended Specifications

- **Format:** PNG (with transparency preferred)
- **Size:** 64x64 pixels or 128x128 pixels
- **File size:** < 50KB each
- **Background:** Transparent or white

## Where to Download Icons

### Official Sources
- **Azure:** https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/resources/
- **Databricks:** https://www.databricks.com/
- **Apache Spark:** https://spark.apache.org/
- **Delta Lake:** https://delta.io/
- **GitHub:** https://github.com/logos
- **TensorFlow:** https://www.tensorflow.org/
- **PyTorch:** https://pytorch.org/
- **Scikit-learn:** https://scikit-learn.org/
- **OpenCV:** https://opencv.org/
- **QGIS:** https://qgis.org/

### Icon Repositories
- **Simple Icons:** https://simpleicons.org/ (SVG, can convert to PNG)
- **DevIcons:** https://devicon.dev/
- **Iconify:** https://icon-sets.iconify.design/logos/

## File Structure

```
static/pics/frameworks/
├── azure.png
├── databricks.png
├── pyspark.png
├── deltalake.png
├── github.png
├── tensorflow.png
├── pytorch.png
├── sklearn.png
├── opencv.png
└── qgis.png
```

## Note

Icons will appear in the Frameworks & Tools section of your CV. Some cards (like Azure) will include a bulleted list of services.
